participant_1.background:
I once pretended to be a tour guide to escape a speeding ticket.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that they love me and I hope that they would accept me for who I am.
I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.
I want to learn how to play the guitar so I can perform my favorite pop songs in front of my friends.
My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them.

participant_2.background:
I am not interested in dying my hair.
i love disney movies.
My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like.
i am an army ranger.
I will be enjoying my time off with my family and friends.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Hi! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How are you?
I'm doing good, too! I'm just hanging out and enjoying my day.
That's great! I'm about to start my day off with a workout.
Oh, fun! I love working out. What kind of workout are you doing?
I'm going to do some cardio and then lift some weights.
Nice! I usually just do cardio, but I'm trying to get into lifting weights more.
It's a lot of fun! And it's really good for you.
I know, I know. I'm just really bad at it!
Don't worry, everyone starts somewhere.
Thanks! I'm just not looking forward to the DOMS!
Oh, yeah, that's always a bummer. But it's worth it!
Haha, I guess so!
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to play video games, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
Oh, nice! I love movies too. What's your favorite movie?
I don't know if I could pick just one favorite movie, but I really love the Harry Potter series.
Oh, I love Harry Potter too! It's my favorite book series.
Mine too! I'm so excited for the new movie coming out.
Me too! I can't wait to see what happens.
Me neither! Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a great day!
You too
